attributes.action: Lower UCAS entry for social work degrees
attributes.additional_details: Why should thoose of us that many not greatly acemdic have to take a long route than thoose that are. It is not fair on thoose of us who struggle just to reach around 240-260 Ucas points for several reasons e.g dsylexia. Social workers are not ment to judge others for what ever situtaion they are in, however protenial social works going in to university are begin judge pruely on their acedemics instead of theor passion to work with people to give them the tools to work. Please support this peition for all those that belive in/or want to be a social worker but dont meet the requirements
